name: Ultra Dash
description:
Dash through space in search of cosmic coins while avoiding dangerous space debris!

- Simple one tap gameplay!
- Extra game themes with cute characters!
- 50 characters to unlock!
- Endless levels!
- Music by Eric Skiff! (www.ericskiff.com)

A game by @johnpassfield

Thanks to Ella P, Zac P, @leighpassfield, @Shanna03, @darren_baker, @funwithstuff, @AlastairTapdaq, @georgeb3dr and @polymonkey
